lyrics:
"Intro" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Intro" (from "Trap House Four" album) Nigga turn up Gucci world nigga It's Guwop Zaytoven, Cut it up, Sean Ugh... Trap House, Bunkin, Trap House Mansion Yea, Right on Flat Shows, Exedus, Parts UnKnown Fuck Nigga I'm pouring 4s in shit I need to just put a deuce in Car cost 400 thousand I put a roof in My nigga pot cooking so go he put his shoe in it Nigga it's a gangsta party why the fuck is you in it Head buster microwave shit they taking too many You know that it's some straps in the club they let my crew in I might just do the Michael Vick dance and cook it left hand If you ain't talking bout buying grams then I'm a deaf man I can make the dope do numbers that's Stacy Oppman I told my bitch to dye her hair red like Dennis Rodman If Gucci Mane got so much money then why he robbing We thirty deep we cover the street nigga we mobbing if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('

'); } Submit Corrections Writer(s): Radric Davis, Lexus Lewis AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics album: "Trap House Four" (2014) Intro Already Top In The Trash Bet Money She Loves Money Drugs Like You Fuck Niggas Never Had Shit Standing In Line Bigger Picture Dope Love Nasty Spit In Yo Face Jugg House Bum Bum I'm So Numb How We Rockin Reminise Search
